verses.name: Nehemiah 11:7
verses.text: And these are the sons of Benjamin; Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Joed, the son of Pedaiah, the son of Kolaiah, the son of Maaseiah, the son of Ithiel, the son of Jesaiah.

verses.name: Nehemiah 11:8
verses.text: And after him Gabbai, Sallai, nine hundred twenty and eight.

verses.name: Nehemiah 11:9
verses.text: And Joel the son of Zichri was their overseer: and Judah the son of Senuah was second over the city.

verses.name: Nehemiah 11:10
verses.text: Of the priests: Jedaiah the son of Joiarib, Jachin.
